text: is a Japanese castle which is in Osaka city of Osaka Prefecture.http://www.osakacastle.net www.osakacastle.net Most of the structures are made of wood. It is one of Japan's "Three Famous Castles." (The other castles are Himeji Castle and Kumamoto Castle.)http://www.uraken.net/museum/indexcastle.html www.uraken.net/museum/indexcastle.html Toyotomi Hideyoshi made the people build Osaka castle in the year 1583 (天正11年). In 1620, Tokugawa Hidetada started to rebuild Osaka Castle and it finished in 1629. Osaka Castle had been destroyed by fire twice. First, The Summer Battle of Osaka (大阪夏の陣) in 1645. Second, during World War II. In 1948, Osaka castle's restoration was started. Now Osaka Castle tower is the symbol of Osaka town. ==References== Category:Castles in Japan Category:1620s establishments in Asia Category:16th- century buildings and structures Category:Osaka
title: Osaka Castle
